A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved it! The visuals were absolutely stunning. The plot had many surprises that few would predict. The dialog was what one should expect from the earliest movies. When put in context to the purported purpose of the series\, this episode fits neatly into the genre or serialized science fiction. The movie has all one might ask of the series. There are huge plot holes and scientific impossibilities\, as with all other Star Wars movies\, but for pure escapist fun\, The Last Jedi was one of the years best.
